Articles.Content: Hoojiwana’s RLA stockalike mod adds a lot of parts in the stock artstyle that complement what’s already there. The engine lineup especially is very impressive, featuring more ion engines, LF/O engines and solid rocket boosters. The pack is completed by RCS units, structural parts, custom particle effects and much, much more that is absolutely worth checking out. Get the mod **[http://goo.gl/3CmfZI](HERE**.

> 
> AKA the other KSPX.

Quiet! We don't want to give them ideas!

> 
> Quiet! We don't want to give them ideas!

I thought we did?

Edit: I *know* we do.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-03T02:07:23Z" title="03/03/2015 02:07  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 3, 2015</time> by Robotengineer**

> 
> Quiet! We don't want to give them ideas!

Yes, yes we do.
PLEASE include this in the game!!
Don't forget Hoojiwana's other WIP mod, [AB launchers](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106687-WIP-AB-Launchers-0-2-5m-Energia-parts-14-Feb).
I really like the 45 degree RCS ports. Use those on just about every build.
Y'know, a stock integration with this mod wouldn't be too bad...

> 
> I really like the 45 degree RCS ports. Use those on just about every build.

Me too. Know what would be even better? A single 4-way RCS part with an "angle" tweakable ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
I like the micro-RCS ports more than the 45-degree option, personally.
I use this - great mod, I'd almost say it is essential.

> 
> I use this - great mod, I'd almost say it is essential.

I second this. It has been a staple of every single version of KSP I played ever since I found it. Fills in the gaps of the stock lineup very nicely.
